gold: The graph illustrates the five most affordable digital camera brands , represented by their average price in pounds sterling . The most affordable of these camera is Konica with an average price of 54 pounds . This is followed by Hunten ( 58 pounds ) Sigma ( 62 pounds ) and Memoto at 70 pounds .
